ComicInfo.Summary: The acclaimed dinosaur fantasy epic continues as the occupying Talpid force attempts to squelch the Monanti slave uprising by killing their leaders and banishing the King. Meanwhile, Lilli uses ancient knowledge to raise a reptilian army for an all-out assault on the city that banished her.
ComicInfo.Title: Penalty for Treason
